original_text: This is the book of the generations of Adam. In the day that God created man, in the likeness of God made he him;
korean_text: 이것은 아담의 계보를 적은 책이니라 하나님이 사람을 창조하실 때에 하나님의 모양대로 지으시되

sentences.original_text: This is the book of the generations of Adam.
In the day that God created man,
in the likeness of God made he him;
